sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button class="button">
    {{text}}
  </button>
</template>

<script setup>
defineProps({
  text: {
    type: String,
    required: true,
  },
  close: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
  error: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  }
})
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.button {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 10px;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
  align-items: center;
  background-color: green;
  padding: 10px 15px;
}
</style>
